svg.desc: Gridmapper, a simple tool to create dungeon maps

g.text: Use the mouse to draw and erase the floor
t : a trap, repeat to remove
d : a door, repeat to rotate
$ : a secret door, repeat to rotate
c : a concealed door, repeat to rotate
g : a gate, repeat to rotate

text.tspan: f : floor, remove traps and stairs
w : remove gates and all kinds of doors
